website_summaries.verdict: You may not want to wear this classy watch every day, but when it comes to special occasions or formal events, it will complement your style perfectly.
pros: Stands out for its sleek, gold-tone finish, mesh ban, and slim design that pairs elegantly with formal attire, from suits to tuxedos
Owners rave about it looking even better in person
cons: Its high-end looks make it impractical for some men to wear every day

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed.
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased luxury watches (Movados and more) through Amazon before this, so I had an idea of what to expect in terms of packaging and knew what to look for in a brand new product. Anticipating the arrival of this watch, I must admit that I'm extremely disappointed. As I opened it, I instantly noticed that this watch was used. Obvious scratches. Even the face had a small scratch on it, covered by a transparent sticker face protector that too looked used. I refuse to pay $350+ for an obviously used item. I didn't even try it on. I sent it back immediately.
customer_reviews.author: JRL

customer_reviews.title: A handsomely masculine watch too!
customer_reviews.text: I acquired this superbly attractive Movado BOLD model 3600373 about a year ago along with the stainless steel model 3600260 and the black steel model 3600261all of which I have enjoyed immensely and recommend highly. They are all the same design and the same size at 44mm case diameter. I'm rather curious as to why the gold BOLD model is presented as a women's style and the other two as men's. (Actually, I'm quite OK with whatever they want to call it and with whoever wants to wear it.) It just seems to me that the gold BOLD model is quite as handsomely masculine in a sophisticated sort of way as any of the Movado BOLD collection. Enjoy!!
customer_reviews.author: Pimentón

feature_bullets: ELEGANT, MODERN DESIGN: The Movado BOLD men’s watch is inspired by refined architectural purity that lets you discover a stunningly beautiful vision of our sunray dial.

QUALITY MATERIALS, ICONIC STYLE: Features a 44 mm yellow gold ion-plated stainless steel case and mesh-link bracelet and a gold-toned metallic Museum dial with matching sunray dot and hands. It is water resistant up to 3 ATM.
SWISS QUARTZ ACCURACY: Swiss quartz movement provides incredibly precise timekeeping, superior craftsmanship and minimal maintenance for a reliable and worry-free timepiece.

K1 MINERAL CRYSTAL GLASS: K1 mineral crystal is the most common crystal used in designer watches and more scratch-resistant than regular mineral crystal—and is even more shatter-resistant than sapphire crystal.

2 YEAR WARRANTY: Movado offers a 2-year limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship that prevent the watch from functioning properly under normal use. Only purchases from an authorized retailer are covered by the manufacturer’s warranty.
